title: APEC Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from APEC.fr, France's leading executive job board. Search by keyword and department to find executive and managerial positions.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific APEC search URL. If provided, this overrides keyword/department settings.

keyword.title: Search Keywords
keyword.description: Job title or skills to search for (e.g., 'Ingénieur Logiciel', 'Chef de Projet', 'Développeur').

department.title: Department Code
department.description: French department number (e.g., '75' for Paris, '27' for Eure, '69' for Rhône).

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Visit each job detail page to extract complete descriptions and additional information.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Jobs to Extract
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to collect (set to high number for all results).

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of result pages to process (safety limit).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Recommended: Use Apify Proxy (residential or datacenter) to avoid blocking.
